task.name: ПМ маска
task.note: Укаызавает, к каким ПМ будут применяться след. команды

task.name: Навигатор точка NW
task.text: Навигатор к точке без проверки достижения

task.name: Выравнивание по углу
task.text: Выровнять AGV не меняя напр. повороток

HBTemerature_Status.text: Передний ПМ Датчик темп. силовой платы

val.note: 0 Position is good for high precision operation, 1 Position is good for normal operation, 2 Position uncertain, recovery is possible, 3 Navigator lost.
Less than three reflections were associated in the last rev.
Uncertainty Score is above threshold.
Innovation Score is above threshold.
No markers have been received from the scanner for 1s.
Position recalculation has been requested and the new result not yet applied.
The vehicle has been stationary for a while and adjustments are not currently being made.

Beacon_Perfrmance_Uncertainty.note: A measure of the current uncertainty of scanner state.

Beacon_Perfrmance_InnovationScore.note: This value indicates the degree to which the reflections disagree with each other and with the deadreckoning information provided by the vehicle controller.

Beacon_Perfrmance_AssociationScore.note: This value indicates how well the Navigator is doing at matching reflections to reflectors.

Beacon_Perfrmance_ConstellationScore.note: This is a prediction of the accuracy which should be expected from the navigation system given the layout of reflectors which are currently being used in the position calculation.

Beacon_Perfrmance_HeadingOffset.note: bdeg, This is the direction of the speed vector supplied by the vehicle controller minus the direction of travel of the scanner derived from laser measurements. There will be one value per scanner.

Beacon_Counts_ReflectionsPerRev.note: The number of reflections received by the laser scanner(s) during the most recently completed rev

Beacon_Counts_AssociationsPerRev.note: The number of reflections received during the past rev which could have been used to correct the position

Beacon_Counts_RevCount.note: Total number of scanner revolutions since the system started. This wraps round to zero after it reaches 65535

Beacon_Counts_ReflectionCount.note: Total number of reflections observed since the system started. This wraps round to zero after it reaches 65535

Beacon_Counts_AssociationCount.note: Total number of reflections which could have been used to correct the position since the program started. This wraps round to zero after it reaches 65535

val.note: 0 Position is good for high precision operation, 1 Position is good for normal operation, 2 Position uncertain, recovery is possible, 3 Navigator lost.
Less than three reflections were associated in the last rev.
Uncertainty Score is above threshold.
Innovation Score is above threshold.
No markers have been received from the scanner for 1s.
Position recalculation has been requested and the new result not yet applied.
The vehicle has been stationary for a while and adjustments are not currently being made.

Beacon_Perfrmance_ConstellationScore.note: This is a prediction of the accuracy which should be expected from the navigation system given the layout of reflectors which are currently being used in the position calculation.

Beacon_Perfrmance_HeadingOffset.note: bdeg, This is the direction of the speed vector supplied by the vehicle controller minus the direction of travel of the scanner derived from laser measurements. There will be one value per scanner.

h.about: 4 - Выбор AGV. Номер по порядку, начиная с '0'
